DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics QMF149 deliver via Concept1 salmeterol xinafoate/fluticasone propionate deliver via Accuhaler adult patient COPD
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety QMF149 vs. Salmeterol Xinafoate/Fluticasone Propionate Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Patients moderate severe COPD ( GOLD 2 GOLD 4 ) accord 2011 Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( GOLD ) Guidelines Patients postbronchodilator FEV1 < 70 % predict normal , postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 0.70 runin ( Visit 101 ) . Current exsmokers smoke history least 10 pack year ( defined number pack 20 cigarette smoke per day multiply number year patient smoke . e.g.10 pack year = 1 pack /day x 10 yr , ½ pack/day x 20 yr ) . An exsmoker may define subject smoke ≥ 6 month screen . Patients COPD exacerbation require treatment antibiotic and/or oral corticosteroid and/or hospitalization 6 week prior screen ( Visit 1 ) . Patients develop COPD exacerbation screening ( Visit 1 ) treatment ( Visit 201 ) eligible permit rescreened minimum 6 week resolution COPD exacerbation . Patients respiratory tract infection within 4 week prior screen Visit 1 . Patients develop respiratory tract infection screening ( Visit 1 ) treatment ( Visit 201 ) eligible , permit rescreened 4 week resolution respiratory tract infection . Patients require long term oxygen therapy prescribe > 12 hour per day . Patients , ) history asthma , b ) onset respiratory symptom prior age 40 year . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
